description: Controls an entity's mouth availability for actions. Contains a lock that can be set by systems (like intimacy or eating mods) to temporarily prevent conflicting mouth-based actions.

locked.description: If true, mouth-based actions are blocked. Systems can set this to prevent conflicting oral activities. Does not specify what is using the mouth.

forcedOverride.description: Reserved for future use. A potential mechanism for special actions to bypass the 'locked' state.
